headDetails.title: Chill ＜＞＜ | Digital Sanctuary
headDetails.description: A community-led sanctuary focused on digital well-being and structured social interaction within VRChat.

hero.title: Chill
hero.subtitle: Cultivating Order in the Digital Chaos.
hero.description: A community-led sanctuary focused on digital well-being and structured social interaction within the Metaverse.

cards.title: The Landscape
cards.content: VRChat is a vast, user-generated metaverse where millions of people interact daily. While it offers boundless freedom, this freedom often results in "digital noise"—visual clutter, loud audio, and overwhelming social environments.

cards.title: The Solution
cards.content: Chill ＜＞＜ was established as a counterbalance. It is a curated community space designed to provide a "third place" for users seeking rest. We focus on low-energy social interaction, providing a strict structure that filters out the noise.

philosophy.label: 02 — The Symbology
philosophy.title: The Philosophy
philosophy.description: The community operates under the philosophical framework of the "FISH <>< Ecosystem."

chaos.title: Chaos
chaos.subtitle: The Left Bracket
chaos.text: Represents the natural tendency of digital spaces to become disordered and loud. It is the entropy that accumulates when no boundaries are set.

structure.title: Structure
structure.subtitle: The Right Bracket
structure.text: Represents the intentional application of rules and moderation to reduce that chaos. It is the force that creates order from disorder.

role.title: Our Role
role.text: This project specifically embodies the ＞ (Structure). We act as the architectural force that creates boundaries, allowing users to find peace in an otherwise chaotic digital universe.

values.label: 03 — Implementation
values.title: Values & Principles
values.description: We maintain the "Structure" through three core pillars.

pillars.title: Audio Discipline
pillars.text: Strict audio protocols to ensure conversations remain calm. No screaming, no mic-spamming.

pillars.title: Visual Clarity
pillars.text: We discourage "visual noise" (avatars with excessive flashing lights) to protect the sensory experience.

pillars.title: Sanctuary Culture
pillars.text: A zero-tolerance policy for toxicity ensures a safe harbor for decompression.

protocols.label: 04 — The Protocols
protocols.title: Instance Rules
protocols.description: The Protocols of Structure > define how we maintain peace.

list.title: Audio Discipline
list.desc: Keep your voice conversational. No loud music.

list.title: Visual Clarity
list.desc: No blinding lights or massive particles.

list.title: Respect the Calm
list.desc: No toxicity or aggressively starting drama.

list.title: No "Chaos" Roleplay
list.desc: Do not bring chaos roleplay here.

list.title: T.O.S. Compliance
list.desc: We strictly follow VRChat Terms of Service.

meeting.title: Weekly Meetings
meeting.text: Every Saturday, the community gathers for structured social sessions.

vision.label: 05 — The Vision
vision.title: Looking Forward
vision.quote: In a hyper-connected world, true silence is rare.
vision.text: Chill ＜＞＜ proves that by applying the right amount of structure, we can create digital spaces for mental rest.

footer.based: Project based on the Structured Chaos Community Ecosystem.
